0: The lobby bar was great fun for people watching on an upscale level with a better menu than their dining room
service personnel are eager to please beautiful lobby well appointed rooms everything was clean and comfortable
Meeting facilities were good and in contrast to may conference venues the food provided for the delegates was consistently excellent
Rooms have all amenities nice bedding
They had coffee and snacks freely available in the mornings in the beautiful lobby which is a great touch
Walking in the chandeliers sparkle the decorations are just the right number properly fluffed tasteful and fun
The amenities and the staff truly did an amazing job at living up to superior standards
I was in Atlanta for a convention and did not have the time to experience the dinning and other facilities which I am sure were excellent
1: The bag had 150 of toiletries in it and they claim that it was thrown out which I do n’t believe

Recent reservations a few weeks back and the power was out for hours the pool and gym was closed for renovation and we were not made aware when booking and have not been able to speak to anyone in a leadership role at the hotel about this
The gym is a nice to have but electricity is a basic necessity
Reception very apologetic and kindly offered complimentary breakfast during our stay
In the morning I took some time to stair at the thermostat and noticed that it just was n’t increasing the temp
Our two different servers at the lobby bar went above and beyond wish I had gotten names
Where the hotel was let down was at reception
Free Wifi should be an amenity for all hotels
Front desk lobby bar and valet were not helpful in any situation or to anyone in our party
Luckily a couple pushed the button from the outside and I finally escaped
